banhDanGian.description: Made from a combination of steamed rice flour and tapioca flour, topped with dried shrimps, crispy pork skin, scallion oil
Clear, chewy tapioca dumplings filled with pork and shrimp
Sizzling savory pancake stuffed with peeled shrimps, pork, bean sprouts
Thin sheets of steamed rice batter filled with ground pork, jicama, wood ear mushrooms
Crispy savory pancakes topped with coconut sauce, shrimp, minced pork
Fried rice dough with egg and green onions

banhTrang.description: Shredded rice paper mixed with tamarind sauce, fresh Vietnamese Coriander, chopped mango, quail eggs, beef jerky
Grilled rice paper with quail eggs, sausage, green onions, dried shrimp
Rolled rice paper quail eggs, beef jerky, pork floss, chopped mango

dessert.description: Three color bean dessert with a coconut milk soup base and taro pieces
A Vietnamese take on a classic Thai dessert tub tim krob with faux pomegranate seeds, mixed fruits, coconut milk
Sweet soup with mung bean and tapioca pearl
Creme caramel custard topped with coffee and ice

giaiKhat.description: Made using medium to coarse ground dark roast Vietnamese coffee with a small metal drip filter
Vietnamese iced coffee with sweetened condensed milk
Freshly cooked soy milk served hot or cold
Made from whisked egg yolk, sweetened condensed milk, club soda
